chemist-1.text: Yes? I'm assuming you want to know about me? I'm not the most gregarious person, but I will try to answer what questions you may have.

responses.chemist-2: Who are you and what's your background?
responses.chemist-3: What's your reason for being here?
I forgot, why are you here?

end-1.message: I could use your skills. Why don't you join me?

chemist-2.text: I'm Helen Abernathy, a chemist from Boston. I have my own apothecary there, but I also conduct experiments during my off hours. I have an extensive knowledge of chemical compounds.

responses.chemist-3: And what's your reason for being here?

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use your skill set. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

chemist-3.text: Doctor Wade contacted me and asked if I could come up here and provide my services to complement his medical knowledge.

responses.end: Ok, I could definitely use your skill set. Why don't you join me?

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use your skill set. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

chemist-4.text: You have enough people with you already. Let me know if you lose anyone or let someone go.

responses.chemist-6: I don't have need of you now.

chemist-6.text: Ok, I'll be in the museum.
